protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for ADP and ATP coupled to G-proteins that inhibit the adenylyl cyclase second messenger system. Not activated by UDP and UTP. Involved in platelets aggregation

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
